You need to add a city...
Укажите какие банкоматы поддерживаете дл: Please indicate which ATMs you support for
Укажите свой курс в поле ниже: Enter your rate in the field below
depends_volumes: The rate depends on the exchange amount
Минимальная и максимальная сумма: Enter the minimum and maximum exchange amount in dollars ($)
Чтобы добавить новое направление укажите: To add a new direction, specify a city or country.
Для добавления безналичного направления,: To add a non-cash direction, select 'Non-cash'
Если забыли пароль, свяжитесь с нами: If you forgot your password, contact us
Такое направление уже добавлено!: This direction has already been added!
Такое направление уже существует на уров: This direction already exists at the partner country level
Чтобы добавить это направление в этом го: To add this direction in this city, delete this direction in the country card
Произошла ошибка на сервере, попробуйте: Server error occurred, please try again later...
Он появится на главной странице: It will appear on the main page

telegram_account.telegram_error_description: Get notifications about important events in your exchange via the Telegram bot
telegram_account.telegram_error_modal_title: Important! You don't have a Telegram account for notifications
telegram_account.telegram_error_modal_description: Attach a Telegram account to receive instant notifications about important events in your exchange
telegram_account.telegram_add_description: Enter your Telegram ID account that you want to link to your exchange, notifications will be sent to your account via the Telegram bot
telegram_account.telegram_add_success_description: Click the button below to complete the account linking
telegram_account.telegram_user_id_how_to_find: How to find your Telegram ID?
telegram_account.telegram_delete_description: Are you sure you want to unlink your Telegram account? You will no longer receive notifications about important events in your exchange via the Telegram bot
